Articles.Content:
Welcome!

Hello there, my name is Ailin and today I want to show you a bit of something that I'm working on right now.

I don't know about you, but I fell in love with "Gravity" (Directed by Alfonso CuarÃƒÂ³n)

(My god, that movie is just plain beautiful)

So, I decided to start producing a "Short" movie about Gravity in the Universe of Kerbal Space Program. The following video

is a kinda "trailer" thingy featuring the strong parts of the short (From silence to masive destruction with touches of "despair")

Yes, I know, I'm not the best editor out there and the video is too short to actually show something...

(I should reconsider re-make it)

http://youtu.be/C1d7W61hLPU

Leave me a comment telling me what do you think :3!
Nice, but a typo. It says Gravity, while it should be Kravity

Not everything with Kerbals in it has to start with K.

Yes I'm like Novasilisko, I don't like when people put K's in front of everything.

Not everything with Kerbals in it has to start with K.

Yes I'm like Novasilisko, I don't like when people put K's in front of everything.

I totally agree with you
